thread.title: EastEnders pays tribute to Strictly Come Dancing with new pet Craig Revel Horwood - EastEnders Soaps -
thread.title_full: EastEnders pays tribute to Strictly Come Dancing with new pet Craig Revel Horwood - EastEnders News - Soaps - Digital Spy

author: Daniel Kilkelly
title: EastEnders pays tribute to Strictly Come Dancing with new pet Craig Revel Horwood - EastEnders Soaps -
text: EastEnders is introducing a brand new pet to Albert Square - and he'll be named after Strictly Come Dancing judge Craig Revel Horwood.Bonnie Langford's character Carmel Kazemi will soon be returning to the show on a permanent basis, but this time she won't be alone as she'll have a pet cat with her. © BBC / Jack BarnesBonnie Langford as Carmel Kazemi Carmel has a strong bond with her feline friend, but it won't be long before he causes trouble on the Square in some fun scenes.EastEnders boss Dominic Treadwell-Collins laughed: "Carmel is about to come back with her cat Craig Revel Horwood. She's a big Strictly fan! "There's an amazing scene where you see Linda Henry and Danny Dyer trying to coax a cat down a tree." © BBCCarmel with Shabnam in EastEnders EastEnders star Kellie Bright - who plays Walford's Linda Carter - is currently competing on Strictly Come Dancing and being judged by the real Craig each week. Could the EastEnders tribute earn her some brownie points from Craig?Langford joined EastEnders earlier this year and was initially on a guest contract with the show. In August, she confirmed that she had been promoted to a regular with a 12-month contract.Read more EastEnders spoilers and newsDigital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on more Gloved Hand Killer deaths in Hollyoaks, the reveal of Robert Sugden's shooter in Emmerdale, a drastic decision from Kathy Beale in EastEnders and Alya Nazir's guilt spiralling out of control in Coronation Street. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4551550723001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14551550723001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4551550723001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4551550723001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14551550723001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4551550723001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Get the Inside Soap magazine on your iPhone or iPad
